transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji bataiye.
Customer: Laptop laptop leke baith jayenge.
Executive: Ji aapne.
Customer: Ye mat boliye.
Executive: Hello haan sir.
Customer: Aapne call kiya tha miss call tha aapke do.
Executive: Sir main IndiaMART se baat kar raha hun. Haan definitely maine call kiya hoga sir aapki company registered hai IndiaMART pe kya?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Sir kis naam se hai sir aap batayiye?
Customer: First hand tech and writing karo.
Executive: Sorry sir kis naam se?
Customer: First hand.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Tech and writing services.
Executive: Sir ek baar mujhe check karna padega kya hai na break mein main niche aaya hua tha main system pe hun nahi sir. Ek baar main wapas ja kar ke na aapka wo karke check karke ek baar call karunga aapko.
Customer: Accha haan ji. Ji ji ji yaad aa gaya sir yaad aa gaya. To wo thoda sa urgent ji aa gaya family mein.
Executive: Accha ji sir.
Customer: Is wajah se maine call bhi pick nahi kar paya aaj ka lead ka bhi schedule dekhenge to ek bhi lead bhi pick nahi kar paye hum aaj. Aisa kaha se.
Executive: Accha ji sir. Haan to thoda sa abhi hum delay kar rahe hain ek aadmi jaise hi main free hota hun ye kaam se.
Customer: Accha sir haan haan.
Executive: Thoda sa family mein urgency hai otherwise koi issue nahi tha.
Customer: Theek hai sir theek hai sir samajh raha hun sir.
Executive: Ji main main manage karta hun sir.
Customer: Theek hai main ek baar aapko bata dunga jaise hi free hota hun phir apan kar lenge theek hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai sir okay sir. Sir tab tak main ye puch raha tha sir tab tak main is concern ka wo main sir aapko main number hai hi mere paas hai main whatsapp bhi kar de raha hun sari cheeze. Haan na aap unability ye sab ye sab concern ko close kar lun sir main abhi ke liye.
Customer: Ji ji ji. Main dobara se aapko internet ticket bhi open kar dunga aapke concern ke liye aisa nahi hai. Main uska reference number bhi aapko de dunga ki aapka concern chal hi raha hai. Hai na. Notification dhyan se dekhiyega sir notification ke sath thoda. Sir ek sath baithenge na sir dekhiye main kya hai na check karna padega ki aapka kya enabled hai kya enabled nahi hai. Baithunga main A to Z main 360 degree aapko profile ka review karke aapko bataunga sir aap uski chinta mat kariye.
Customer: Okay sir koi issue nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir okay.
Customer: Thank you.
Executive: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to pick up leads.

- Wants to close the current concerns.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about family emergency.

- Executive assured to resolve concerns after free.

- Executive will provide reference number for concern.

- Executive will review profile and inform customer.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, profile, concerns, family emergency
